description: This standing offer is for the acquisition of air filters as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Standing Offer: Air Filters Supply
#### Solicitation Number: WS3775023791
##### Solicitation Issue Date: December 16, 2022

**The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) solicits submissions for a Standing Offer for the Supply of Air Filters under solicitation number WS3775023791. The solicitation seeks contractors to provide various air filters in compliance with the requirements detailed in Annex A.**

**Key Dates:**
| Date | Description |
| --- | --- |
| December 16, 2022 | Solicitation Issue Date |
| February 7, 2023, 2 PM EST | Bid Submission Deadline |

**Scope of Work:**

The PSPC is seeking contractors to supply air filters as detailed in Annex A of the solicitation document. The contractor(s) selected will be invited to participate in a Standing Offer contract.

**Important Note:**

* All Required Supporting Documentation and bid submission must be received by the PSPC by 2 PM EST on February 7, 2023. Late submissions will not be considered.
* The PSPC reserves the right to declare any non-responsive bids.

**Contact Information:**

* Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available

**Solicitation Documents and Support Materials:**

* The solicitation document, Annex A, and any attachments are available on the Ariba C2 PENO subsystem for potential bidders to review and download.

**Additional Notes and Requirements:**

* This solicitation is open to Canadian and foreign vendors, as per the Trade Agreements outlined below.
* The Vendor agrees to comply with all applicable laws and regulations, as outlined in the procurement contract.

**Trade Agreements Authorized:**

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Operation:**

* Longueuil
* Montréal

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Longueuil
* Montréal

**FTA Exceptions:**

This solicitation is open to all forms of contracts. No draft or pending agreements in the form of letters of
